servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

ptxt.emph: P0112: Intake Air Temperature Sensor 1 Circuit Low

entry.ptxt: IAT sensor signal is higher than 132 °C (270 °F) for 5 sec.

ptxt.emph: P0113: Intake Air Temperature Sensor 1 Circuit High

entry.ptxt: IAT sensor signal is lower than –42 °C (–44 °F) for 5 sec.

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC P0100 / P0102 / P0103:N32A .

s1.ptxt: Run engine at idle speed for 5 min.

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:N32A .

testgroup.title: IAT sensor signal circuit and ground circuit check

test1.ptxt: With ignition switch turned OFF, disconnect connectors from MAF & IAT sensor and ECM.
Check for proper terminal connection to MAF & IAT sensor and ECM connectors.
If connections are OK, check that IAT sensor signal circuit (B1) and IAT sensor ground circuit (B2) are as follows.

item.ptxt: Wiring harness resistance of each IAT sensor signal circuit and ground circuit is less than 3 Ω.
Insulation resistance of IAT sensor signal circuit is infinity between MAF and IAT sensor connector and vehicle body ground.
Insulation resistance of wire harness is infinity between IAT sensor signal circuit terminal and other terminal at MAF and IAT sensor connector.
Circuit voltage of each IAT sensor signal circuit and ground circuit is 0 – 1 V with ignition switch turned ON.

testgroup.question: Are they in good condition?

action.ptxt: Repair or replace defective wire harness.

testgroup.title: Troubleshooting of other DTC(s) at the same time
testgroup.question: Is other DTC(s) detected together?

action.ptxt: Go to troubleshooting for applicable DTC.
Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
